item.title: Manakamana
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: Gorakha: A mid-hill town lies between Kathmandu and Pokhara. The legend of Gurkhas begins here. Situated on a hill overlooking the snowy peaks of the Himalaya is the beautiful Gorakha Durbar. The Gorakha Durbar is a fort with palace and temple complex. It was from this very palace that King Prithvi Narayan Shah began his campaign to unify the present Kingdom of Nepal. Gorakha is a starting point of Trekking in Manaslu region.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Gorakha: A mid-hill town lies between Kathmandu and Pokhara. The legend of Gurkhas begins here. Situated on a hill overlooking the snowy peaks of the Himalaya is the beautiful Gorakha Durbar. The Gorakha Durbar is a fort with palace and temple complex. It was from this very palace that King Prithvi Narayan Shah began his campaign to unify the present Kingdom of Nepal. Gorakha is a starting point of Trekking in Manaslu region.

Places of interest: Gorakha Durbar, Gorakhnath Temple, Gorakhkali Temple, etc.
Access: Gorakha is best accessed by car and bus.

Mankamana Temple is on the top of hill in Gorakha district. It is a scenic and pilgrim site. The Mankamana Temple is a famous temple where you wish to fulfill your wishes. Mankamana Temple is best accessed by cable car from Kuringhat at Highway between Kathmandu and Pokhara or by half day trekking.

Access: Kuringhat is best accessed by car. Thus the trip to Mankamana Temple can be made a part of the tour to Gorakha or Pokhara.

One can do 3 hours rafting in Trishuli river with put out point on Kuringhat and can enjoy cable car ride to Mankamana temple.

Embark on a 5-day adventure blending culture, nature, and relaxation. Start with exploring iconic landmarks and sampling local cuisine. Dive into history and museums, discovering the heart of the destination. Enjoy a day of adventurehiking, snorkeling, or scenic tours. Experience hidden gems, from charming neighborhoods to unique workshops. Savor local flavors at bustling markets and street food stalls. Unwind with a spa treatment or sunset views at a picturesque spot. Immerse yourself in nightlife, live music, or cultural performances. Wrap up your trip with last-minute shopping and a relaxed farewell morning. Leave with unforgettable memories and a deeper connection to the place.

item.title: Bardia
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: Chase the tigers of Nepal is a must for anyone remotely interested in wildlife. There are very few places left in the world to see these iconic creatures in their unspoiled natural habitat where the tiger is neither tamed nor accustomed to contact with human behaviour . Bardia National Park is decleared as the second best place in the world to see tiger by Lonely Planet. Nepal has Doubled its Tiger population in 4 years timespan.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Chase the tigers of Nepal is a must for anyone remotely interested in wildlife. There are very few places left in the world to see these iconic creatures in their unspoiled natural habitat where the tiger is neither tamed nor accustomed to contact with human behaviour . Bardia National Park is decleared as the second best place in the world to see tiger by Lonely Planet. Nepal has Doubled its Tiger population in 4 years timespan.Chase the tigers of Nepal is a must for anyone remotely interested in wildlife. There are very few places left in the world to see these iconic creatures in their unspoiled natural habitat where the tiger is neither tamed nor accustomed to contact with human behaviour . Bardia National Park is decleared as the second best place in the world to see tiger by Lonely Planet. Nepal has Doubled its Tiger population in 4 years timespan.

Day 01
Arrival in Kathmandu

You will be arriving in the ancient city of Kathmandu Valley. Nepals capital was created through the coming together of three historic kingdoms: Patan, Kathmandu city and Bhaktapur. Kathmandus culture and history go back centuries with much of it shown in the rituals taken place by the Nepali people today. You will be staying overnight in Dwarika's Hotel. Dwarika's Hotel in Kathmandu is a heritage hotel that contains some of the best Nepali craftsmanship and captures the beauty and spirit of Kathmandu.

Day 02
Kathmandu - Nepalgunj

The short flight to Nepalgunj, in West Nepal, brings you to the plain and fertile land of Terai . The views from the flight offer a panorama view of the Himalayas, like no other, white-capped Himalayas as far as the eye can see! . On arrival in Nepalgunj, you will be transferred to your new home away from home You will be staying in a Tiger Tops Karnali Lodge. Karnali lodge is an intimate lodge with outstanding personal service and expert guiding and the emphasis is on fresh, local, organic food. The lodge creates a intimate retreat with a beautiful and clam rooms.

Day 03
Tiger Spotting in Bardia National Park

Once settled, we will head out into Bardia National Park on either the back of an elephant or by jeep, in search for the elusive Bengal Tiger and leopard. Tigers hunt in the cool parts of the day so dusk is a great time to catch a glimpse of the great cats patrolling their territories. Tiger safaris can last for two and a half hours, or for hardcore enthusiasts half or full days. You will be accompanied by an experienced naturalist who will provide in-depth knowledge of the local fauna and flora of Bardia National Park. The evening will be spent with cocktails around an outdoor fireplace before moving into the GholGharr (Nepalese dining room) for dinner.

Day 04
Bardia- Kathmandu

Today you will be back in Kathmandu " The city of Temples " . You will be taking flight back to Kathmandu. We will have a farewell dinner in a authentic Nepalese style in Kathmandu today.

item.title: Millennium
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: New York is the city that never sleeps. In the center of it all, Millennium Broadway Hotel New York is located in the heart of Times Square giving guests a front row seat to all of the endless action and constant excitement.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: New York is the city that never sleeps. In the center of it all, Millennium Broadway Hotel New York is located in the heart of Times Square giving guests a front row seat to all of the endless action and constant excitement. We cater to both leisure and business travelers and is why we are preferred choice for a New York City hotel. We boast a welcoming, multi-lingual cast and crew, 626 thoughtfully appointed rooms, a 24/7 fitness center and complimentary Wi-Fi. In addition, our meeting and event facilities are second to none. Featuring 64,000 sq ft (5,945 sq m) of flexible meeting space, we are the only hotel in the city accredited by the International Association of Conference Centers. item.title: Lyric Hotel
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: Lyric at 70 Pine, located in Lower Manhattan, provides apartment style suites that are three times larger than typical NYC hotel rooms. Standout features include full-sized kitchens with top-of-the-line cookware, dishwashers and stoves; bespoke furniture and king size beds across all suite categories; smart TVs with streaming capability and Bose Bluetooth-enabled audio systems.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Lyric at 70 Pine, located in Lower Manhattan, provides apartment style suites that are three times larger than typical NYC hotel rooms. Standout features include full-sized kitchens with top-of-the-line cookware, dishwashers and stoves; bespoke furniture and king size beds across all suite categories; smart TVs with streaming capability and Bose Bluetooth-enabled audio systems. All stays include free WiFi, daily housekeeping, and a 24-hour business center. Amenities include bath robes, premium bath products, and separate seating/office areas in many residences. Additional property amenities: 24-hour front desk, concierge services, complimentary newspapers, valet laundry and dry cleaning, parking, Elite NYSC gym, Black Fox Coffee Company, Blue Park Kitchen, City Acres Market, and Crown Shy. Enjoy easy access to all of Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn, with subway lines 2 and 3 located directly in front of the hotel and lines 4, 5, A, C, J and Z within walking distance.

item.title: Ko Samui
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: Ko Samui, Thailands second largest island, lies in the Gulf of Thailand off the east coast of the Kra Isthmus. It's known for its palm-fringed beaches, coconut groves and dense, mountainous rainforest, plus luxury resorts and posh spas. The landmark 12m-tall golden Big Buddha statue at Wat Phra Yai Temple is located on a tiny island connected to KoSamui by a causeway.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Ko Samui, Thailands second largest island, lies in the Gulf of Thailand off the east coast of the Kra Isthmus. It's known for its palm-fringed beaches, coconut groves and dense, mountainous rainforest, plus luxury resorts and posh spas. The landmark 12m-tall golden Big Buddha statue at Wat Phra Yai Temple is located on a tiny island connected to KoSamui by a causeway.
The popular beaches of Chaweng and Lamai, on the east coast, have lounge chairs and strolling vendors, while the towns around them are the islands party centers, packed with pubs, go-go bars and nightclubs. On the north side is the more laid-back village of Bo Phut, which features former Chinese shophouses converted to stylish restaurants, cafes and boutique hotels, as well as a night market selling street food, clothing and souvenirs. Nearby lies tranquil Maenam Beach, while the old capital Nathon lies on the west coast. Day trips to the limestone-cliff islets of Ang Thong Marine National Park offer snorkeling and diving.

item.title: Green Hills
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: Vermont is a state in the northeastern United States, known for its natural landscape, which is primarily forested. Part of the New England region, it's also known for being home to more than 100 19th-century covered wooden bridges, and as a major producer of maple syrup. Thousands of acres of mountain terrain are crossed by hiking trails and skiing slopes.

Vermont is a state in the northeastern United States, known for its natural landscape, which is primarily forested. Part of the New England region, it's also known for being home to more than 100 19th-century covered wooden bridges, and as a major producer of maple syrup. Thousands of acres of mountain terrain are crossed by hiking trails and skiing slopes.Vermont is a state in the northeastern United States, known for its natural landscape, which is primarily forested. Thousands of acres of mountain terrain are crossed by hiking trails and skiing slopes.

Discover the vibrant energy of a world-class city in just five days. From towering skyscrapers to charming old towns, this itinerary blends history, culture, and modern attractions seamlessly. Stroll through bustling streets and hidden alleys, uncovering street art, boutique shops, and local gems. Visit landmark attractions, whether it's a famous tower, a grand museum, or a centuries-old palace. Dive into the culinary scene, tasting everything from street food delights to Michelin-starred experiences. Enjoy a scenic river cruise or rooftop cocktail hour to take in breathtaking views. Step into the past at historical sites and heritage districts, learning about the city's rich history. Indulge in a shopping spree, exploring vibrant markets and luxury malls. Take a break in tranquil parks or botanical gardens for a refreshing escape. Experience the citys nightlife, from lively bars to cultural performances. Discover a hidden neighborhood known only to locals. Engage in a hands-on workshopcooking, pottery, or artto take home a piece of the city. Explore museums, galleries, and theaters, immersing yourself in local culture. Visit an iconic viewpoint for a stunning panorama. Spend a morning at a bustling caf, soaking in the citys rhythm. Take a day trip to a nearby scenic destination or cultural town. Try a traditional afternoon tea or coffee experience. Capture Instagram-worthy shots at famous landmarks and secret spots. Enjoy a farewell dinner at a scenic restaurant, reliving the highlights of your adventure. Stroll through the city one last time, savoring the atmosphere before departure. Return home with unforgettable memories and a newfound love for urban exploration.

Dive into history and museums, discovering the heart of the destination. Enjoy a day of adventurehiking, snorkeling, or scenic tours. Unwind with a spa treatment or sunset views at a picturesque spot. Immerse yourself in nightlife, live music, or cultural performances. Wrap up your trip with last-minute shopping and a relaxed farewell morning. Leave with unforgettable memories and a deeper connection to the place.

item.excerpt:encoded: Discover the vibrant energy of a world-class city in just five days. From towering skyscrapers to charming old towns, this itinerary blends history, culture, and modern attractions seamlessly.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:

Escape into nature with an action-packed itinerary designed for outdoor lovers. Begin your adventure with a scenic hike, breathing in fresh mountain air or coastal breezes. Explore lush forests, cascading waterfalls, and wildlife-rich reserves. Take a thrilling rafting, kayaking, or zip-lining adventure through breathtaking landscapes. Visit a national park or nature reserve, spotting exotic birds and animals. Experience the thrill of sunrise from a mountain peak or a scenic hot air balloon ride. Cool off in crystal-clear lakes, serene rivers, or hidden beaches. Enjoy a picnic with panoramic views, surrounded by natures beauty. Immerse yourself in local eco-tourism projects, supporting sustainability. Take a guided night walk, discovering nocturnal wildlife. Ride a bicycle through picturesque countryside, stopping at charming villages. Spend an evening stargazing, away from city lights. Unwind in a natural hot spring or riverside lodge. Discover ancient caves, rock formations, or volcanic landscapes. Try local organic food, fresh from farm-to-table experiences. Visit a botanical garden to admire exotic plants and flowers. Capture breathtaking moments with a nature photography session. Join a conservation project, helping to protect the environment. Relax by a bonfire, sharing stories under the stars. End your trip with a serene meditation or yoga session in nature. Return home feeling recharged, inspired, and connected to the natural world.

Embark on aadventure blending culture, nature, and relaxation. Start with exploring iconic landmarks and sampling local cuisine. Dive into history and museums, discovering the heart of the destination. Enjoy a day of adventurehiking, snorkeling, or scenic tours. Experience hidden gems, from charming neighborhoods to unique workshops. Savor local flavors at bustling markets and street food stalls. Unwind with a spa treatment or sunset views at a picturesque spot. Immerse yourself in nightlife, live music, or cultural performances. Wrap up your trip with last-minute shopping and a relaxed farewell morning. Leave with unforgettable memories and a deeper connection to the place.

Accommodation (Hotels/Resorts/B&Bs)
Daily breakfast and select meals
Guided sightseeing tours & entrance fees
Local transportation (transfers, public transport, or rental)
Adventure or cultural activities (hiking, boat tours, workshops)
24/7 customer support or tour assistance

International & domestic airfare
Personal expenses (shopping, tips, laundry)
Travel insurance & visa fees
Optional tours & extra activities
Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
Any expenses due to unforeseen circumstances (weather, delays)

Step into a world of traditions, history, and cultural treasures on this immersive trip. Start your journey with a guided tour of ancient ruins, castles, or temples. Walk through historical streets, admiring colonial or medieval architecture. Explore museums filled with artifacts and stories from the past. Witness traditional performancesfolk dances, music, or theater. Engage with artisans in a craft workshop, learning pottery, weaving, or painting. Visit a UNESCO heritage site, marveling at its historical significance. Savor authentic cuisine, cooked using traditional methods. Participate in a local festival or celebration, experiencing age-old customs. Take a scenic train or boat ride, discovering the landscapes that shaped the culture. Meet locals who share stories of their ancestors and way of life. Explore bustling markets, where you can buy handmade crafts and souvenirs. Step into a centuries-old temple, mosque, church, or synagogue, soaking in the spiritual ambiance. Try traditional attire for a cultural photo session. Discover hidden legends and myths tied to historical landmarks. Walk through royal palaces or noble estates, once home to rulers and aristocrats. Take part in a culinary masterclass, learning the secrets of local flavors. Visit ancient libraries, monasteries, or learning centers filled with wisdom. Experience a sunset ceremony or traditional ritual at a sacred site. Dine in a heritage home or historic caf, surrounded by timeless charm. Return home with a deeper understanding of the destinations history and soul.

Embark on aadventure blending culture, nature, and relaxation. Start with exploring iconic landmarks and sampling local cuisine. Dive into history and museums, discovering the heart of the destination. Enjoy a day of adventurehiking, snorkeling, or scenic tours. Experience hidden gems, from charming neighborhoods to unique workshops. Savor local flavors at bustling markets and street food stalls. Unwind with a spa treatment or sunset views at a picturesque spot. Immerse yourself in nightlife, live music, or cultural performances. Wrap up your trip with last-minute shopping and a relaxed farewell morning. Leave with unforgettable memories and a deeper connection to the place.

Accommodation (Hotels/Resorts/B&Bs)
Daily breakfast and select meals
Guided sightseeing tours & entrance fees
Local transportation (transfers, public transport, or rental)
Adventure or cultural activities (hiking, boat tours, workshops)
24/7 customer support or tour assistance

International & domestic airfare
Personal expenses (shopping, tips, laundry)
Travel insurance & visa fees
Optional tours & extra activities
Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
Any expenses due to unforeseen circumstances (weather, delays)

item.title: Island Paradise Escape
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.excerpt:encoded: Sail away to a tropical paradise, where the ocean meets golden shores. Relax on pristine beaches, soaking up the sun and sea breeze.

Sail away to a tropical paradise, where the ocean meets golden shores. Relax on pristine beaches, soaking up the sun and sea breeze. Take a snorkeling or scuba diving trip, exploring vibrant coral reefs. Enjoy a sunset cruise with cocktails, admiring the horizon. Hike through lush jungles, discovering waterfalls and exotic wildlife. Visit remote islands, untouched by mass tourism. Dine on fresh seafood by the beach, with waves as your soundtrack. Try water sports like paddleboarding, jet skiing, or parasailing. Experience a local fishing village, learning traditional island life. Take a yoga or meditation session by the sea. Explore caves, lagoons, and marine sanctuaries. Visit a historic fort or lighthouse, soaking in panoramic views. Join a local dance performance, feeling the island rhythm. Indulge in a spa day with coconut-infused treatments. Discover secret sandbars, where the ocean disappears into the sky. Capture Instagram-worthy beach swings and hammock shots. Enjoy a barbecue under the stars, with fresh tropical fruits. Take a bike ride along palm-lined coastal paths. Experience a bioluminescent night swim, watching the water glow. Leave with sun-kissed memories and island vibes in your soul.

Embark on aadventure blending culture, nature, and relaxation. Start with exploring iconic landmarks and sampling local cuisine. Dive into history and museums, discovering the heart of the destination. Enjoy a day of adventurehiking, snorkeling, or scenic tours. Experience hidden gems, from charming neighborhoods to unique workshops. Savor local flavors at bustling markets and street food stalls. Unwind with a spa treatment or sunset views at a picturesque spot. Immerse yourself in nightlife, live music, or cultural performances. Wrap up your trip with last-minute shopping and a relaxed farewell morning. Leave with unforgettable memories and a deeper connection to the place.

Accommodation (Hotels/Resorts/B&Bs)
Daily breakfast and select meals
Guided sightseeing tours & entrance fees
Local transportation (transfers, public transport, or rental)
Adventure or cultural activities (hiking, boat tours, workshops)

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Theme Palace Demo. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Exploring Paris
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.content:encoded: Paris is more than just the Eiffel Tower. From hidden cafs to charming street markets, discover the city's best-kept secrets and experience it like a true Parisian.
item.excerpt:encoded: Paris is more than just the Eiffel Tower. From hidden cafs to charming street markets, discover the city's best-kept secrets and experience it like a true Parisian.

item.title: Romantic Getaway To Your Dream
item.dc:creator: a2z-pro
item.content:encoded: Escape with your loved one on a dreamy and unforgettable retreat. Begin your journey with a scenic sunset cruise, toasting to your love. Stay in a luxurious resort, beach villa, or cozy countryside retreat. Start each day with a breakfast in bed or by the ocean. Explore charming towns, cobblestone streets, and flower-filled gardens. Take a private wine-tasting tour, sampling the finest local blends. Enjoy a romantic picnic by a lake, river, or scenic viewpoint. Walk hand in hand through picturesque landscapes, capturing breathtaking moments. Indulge in a couples spa experience, unwinding with massages and aromatherapy. Dine in an intimate candlelit setting, savoring gourmet cuisine. Watch the sunrise from a mountaintop or serene beach. Ride a hot air balloon or scenic gondola, floating above dreamy landscapes. Discover hidden waterfalls, secret beaches, or fairytale castles. Take a cooking class together, creating a romantic dish. Enjoy an outdoor movie night under the stars. Write love notes or lock your love on a famous bridge. Experience a horse-drawn carriage ride through a historic town. Stroll through flower markets or botanical gardens, embracing the scent of romance. Take a dance class together, from tango to waltz. Capture memorable couple photos at stunning backdrops. Return home with hearts full of love and cherished memories.

Message Body: [your-message]

[_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [your-email] Message Body: [your-message]
-- This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message. Reply-To: [_site_admin_email]
Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. Please fill out this field. This field has a too long input. This field has a too short input. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The uploaded file is too large. There was an error uploading the file. Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field has a too early date. This field has a too late date. Please enter a number. This field has a too small number. This field has a too large number. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Please enter an email address. Please enter a URL. Please enter a telephone number.
